content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Line (x=1.0-3.0, y=1.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (x=1.0, y=1.0) and (x=3.0, y=1.0)
- Two burner inserters at (x=1.5, y=2.5) and (x=3.5, y=2.5)
- Two output chests at (x=1.5, y=3.5) and (x=3.5, y=3.5) containing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production Line (x=2.0-4.0, y=7.0)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (x=2.0, y=7.0) and (x=4.0, y=7.0)
- Two burner inserters at (x=2.5, y=8.5) and (x=4.5, y=8.5)
- Output chests at (x=2.5, y=9.5) and (x=4.5, y=9.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the production line

### Copper Cable Assembly Line (x=14.5, y=14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembly machine 1 at (x=14.5, y=14.5) set to produce copper cables
- Input chest at (x=14.5, y=11.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (x=14.5, y=12.5) feeding the assembly machine
- Output chest at (x=11.5, y=14.5) collecting copper cables
- Burner inserter at (x=12.5, y=14.5) moving finished products

### Electronic Circuit Assembly Line (x=21.5, y=15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembly machine 1 at (x=21.5, y=15.5) set to produce electronic circuits
- Input chest at (x=21.5, y=11.5) containing iron plates
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for material handling

### Power Generation System (x=2.5-13.5, y=35.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (x=2.5, y=35.5)
- Boiler at (x=7.0, y=35.5)
- Steam engine at (x=13.5, y=35.5)
- Pipe network connecting water and steam
- Electric pole network distributing power

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Shortage Errors
- Ensure required materials are available in inventory before attempting to insert them into containers
- Check if assembly machines have all required ingredients before starting production

### Assembly Machine Configuration Issues
- Verify recipes are properly set and all required ingredients are available
- Ensure proper input/output logistics chain is established before starting production

### Inserter Placement Issues
- Make sure inserters have proper clearance for pickup and drop-off
- Check if destination containers have available space before attempting insertion

### Fluid System Connectivity
- Ensure all fluid-carrying entities (pipes, pumps, boilers) are properly connected
- Verify correct orientation of fluid input/output connections
